result.eng: It would better to stay out of view.
result.html: b'fhearr fanacht as amharcIt would better to stay out of view.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟearr fanaċt as aṁarcIt would better to stay out of view.

result.eng: I'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ga: b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.orig: b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.html: b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamhI'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟearr liom fanaċt taoḃ istiġ den ḟoirgneaṁI'd rather stay inside the building.

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: You must stay at home then.
result.ga: caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sin
result.orig: caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sin
result.html: caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sinYou must stay at home then.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ tú fanaċt sa ḃaile mar sinYou must stay at home then.

result.eng: How long did you stay in France?

result.orig: cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa fhrainc
result.html: cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa fhraincHow long did you stay in France?
result.ponchtml: cá ḟad a d'ḟan tú sa ḟraincHow long did you stay in France?

result.eng: Why did you stay so long?
result.ga: cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.orig: cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.html: cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sinWhy did you stay so long?
result.ponchtml: cén fáṫ ar ḟan tú ċoṁ fada sinWhy did you stay so long?

result.ga: fan amach ón dream sin
result.orig: fan amach ón dream sin
result.html: fan amach ón dream sinStay away from those people.
result.ponchtml: fan amaċ ón dream sinStay away from those people.

result.html: fan as mo bhealachStay out of my way.
result.ponchtml: fan as mo ḃealaċStay out of my way.

result.html: fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!
result.ponchtml: fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!

result.ga: fan i do thost le do thoil
result.orig: fan i do thost le do thoil
result.html: fan i do thost le do thoilStay quiet please.
result.ponchtml: fan i do ṫost le do ṫoilStay quiet please.

result.ga: fan san áit a bhfuil tú
result.orig: fan san áit a bhfuil tú
result.html: fan san áit a bhfuil túStay where you are.
result.ponchtml: fan san áit a ḃfuil túStay where you are.

result.eng: I stay out of those discussions if I can.

result.html: fanaim as na díospóireachtaí sin más féidir liomI stay out of those discussions if I can.

result.ga: ní féidir liom fanacht i mo dhúiseacht

result.html: ní féidir liom fanacht i mo dhúiseachtI can't stay awake.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir liom fanaċt i mo ḋúiseaċtI can't stay awake.

result.eng: It is raining, I'd rather stay in.

result.eng: It is raining, I'd rather stay in.

result.eng: I usually stay in Monday night, watching TV.

result.eng: They decided to stay on dry land till morning.
